00012 #define DHCP_COARSE_TIMER_SECS 60 
00013 
00014 #define DHCP_FINE_TIMER_MSECS 500 
00015 
00016 struct dhcp
00017 {
00019   u8_t state;
00021   u8_t tries;
00023   u32_t xid;
00025   struct udp_pcb *pcb;
00027   struct pbuf *p;
00029   struct dhcp_msg *msg_in;
00031   struct dhcp_msg *options_in; 
00033   u16_t options_in_len;
00034 
00035   struct pbuf *p_out; /* pbuf of outcoming msg */
00036   struct dhcp_msg *msg_out; /* outgoing msg */
00037   u16_t options_out_len; /* outgoing msg options length */
00038   u16_t request_timeout; /* #ticks with period DHCP_FINE_TIMER_SECS for request timeout */
00039   u16_t t1_timeout;  /* #ticks with period DHCP_COARSE_TIMER_SECS for renewal time */
00040   u16_t t2_timeout;  /* #ticks with period DHCP_COARSE_TIMER_SECS for rebind time */
00041   struct ip_addr server_ip_addr; /* dhcp server address that offered this lease */
00042   struct ip_addr offered_ip_addr;
00043   struct ip_addr offered_sn_mask;
00044   struct ip_addr offered_gw_addr;
00045   struct ip_addr offered_bc_addr;
00046   u32_t offered_t0_lease; /* lease period (in seconds) */
00047   u32_t offered_t1_renew; /* recommended renew time (usually 50% of lease period) */
00048   u32_t offered_t2_rebind; /* recommended rebind time (usually 66% of lease period)  */
00052 #if 0
00053   struct ip_addr offered_si_addr;
00054   u8_t *boot_file_name;
00055 #endif
00056 };
00057 
00058 /* MUST be compiled with "pack structs" or equivalent! */
00059 #ifdef PACK_STRUCT_USE_INCLUDES
00060 #  include "arch/bpstruct.h"
00061 #endif
00062 PACK_STRUCT_BEGIN
00064 struct dhcp_msg
00065 {
00066   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t op);
00067   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t htype);
00068   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t hlen);
00069   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t hops);
00070   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t xid);
00071   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t secs);
00072   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t flags);
00073   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t ciaddr);
00074   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t yiaddr);
00075   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t siaddr);
00076   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t giaddr);
00077 #define DHCP_CHADDR_LEN 16U
00078   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t chaddr[DHCP_CHADDR_LEN]);
00079 #define DHCP_SNAME_LEN 64U
00080   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t sname[DHCP_SNAME_LEN]);
00081 #define DHCP_FILE_LEN 128U
00082   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t file[DHCP_FILE_LEN]);
00083   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t cookie);
00084 #define DHCP_MIN_OPTIONS_LEN 68U
00085 
00086 #if ((!defined(DHCP_OPTIONS_LEN)) || (DHCP_OPTIONS_LEN < DHCP_MIN_OPTIONS_LEN))
00087 
00088 #  define DHCP_OPTIONS_LEN DHCP_MIN_OPTIONS_LEN
00089 #endif
00090   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u8_t options[DHCP_OPTIONS_LEN]);
00091 } PACK_STRUCT_STRUCT;
00092 PACK_STRUCT_END

00186 #define DHCP_OPTION_REQUESTED_IP 50 /* RFC 2132 9.1, requested IP address */
00187 #define DHCP_OPTION_LEASE_TIME 51 /* RFC 2132 9.2, time in seconds, in 4 bytes */
00188 #define DHCP_OPTION_OVERLOAD 52 /* RFC2132 9.3, use file and/or sname field for options */
00189

00191 #define DHCP_OPTION_MESSAGE_TYPE_LEN 1
00192

00198 #define DHCP_OPTION_MAX_MSG_SIZE_LEN 2
